name: sounds-rights-backend
description: Microservices backend for SoundsRights music licensing platform

scripts.install:all: npm run install:gateway && npm run install:services
scripts.install:services: cd auth-service && npm install && cd ../songs-service && npm install && cd ../licenses-service && npm install && cd ../chat-service && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:services
scripts.build:services: cd auth-service && npm run build && cd ../songs-service && npm run build && cd ../licenses-service && npm run build && cd ../chat-service && npm run build
